attributes.action: Use all petrol taxes, car tax licence fees, and fixed motoring penalties to fund road improvements and parking facilities.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: At the moment (Feb 2007) most of the tax raised from motorists is spent on non-motoring activities.  We should stop subsidising other functions and spend 'our' money on making improvements to the road infrastructure and parking facilities.
